title.rendered: Top 3 Benefits of Junking Your Car

content.rendered:
If you have a heap of a car taking up space in your driveway or garage, there’s a good chance you’re feeling unsure about what to do with it. You could fix it up or work to find a buyer, but there’s a strong argument to be made for selling it for parts. Today, we’ll name some of the main reasons vehicle owners make this choice.

1. Cash on the spot

All you need to do is pick up the phone! Aero Auto Parts can come pick up your car from anywhere in our service area. We’ll show up to tow it off your property and make you a cash offer.

2. Reclaim your space

Your garage or driveway may feel cramped and useless now, but you’re bound to see much more potential in the space once the junk car is gone. Get the useless car out and start living large!

3. Avoid the hassle of finding a buyer

If your car is in really poor condition, it may be difficult to find a buyer on your own. Buyers may be hesitant to pay your asking price if many repairs need to be made, which can complicate the process.

We Buy Junk Cars in Chicago, IL

If you feel that your car is no longer safe to drive, it may be time to sell it for parts. At Aero Auto Parts, we offer vehicle owners cash on the spot for junk cars in Chicago, IL. If all your car needs is a replacement part to become road-ready, we can help with that too! Contact us today to check our stock.
